title: Love Island's Francesca Allen catches the eye in a flowy belted dress at The Best Heroes Awards
text:
She regularly hits the town with her fellow celebrity pals in head-turning ensembles.

And Francesca Allen maintained her style savvy ways as she attended The Best Heroes Awards, held at The Bloomsbury Hotel in west London on Tuesday evening.

The Love Island star, 23, commanded attention as she strutted to the event in a plunging belted midi-dress, complete with a choker neckline.

Looking good: Francesca Allen maintained her style savvy ways as she attended The Best Heroes Awards, held at The Bloomsbury Hotel in west London on Tuesday evening

Upping the fashion ante, the TV personality's number featured trendy balloon-inspired sleeves, while the reality star flashed her nude pedicure in sandalled heels.

The boutique owner injected a hint of evening glamour into her appearance with diamond dangle earrings.

With her chocolate tresses styled into bouncy curls, she complemented her striking features with shimmery orange eyeshadow and nude lipgloss.

Best Magazine's annual event recognises the UK's most deserving heroes for their exceptional courage and bravery.

Earlier this month, Francesca flew out to the capital of the United Arab Emirates, where she partied with the likes of Olivia Buckland and husband Alex Bowen and Harley Brash.

The TV star also shared a snap with her pal Paul Hutchie and joked: 'Instagram couple goals' as they shared a laugh by a palm tree with cocktails in hand.

All in the details: The boutique owner injected a hint of evening glamour into her appearance with diamond dangle earrings

Francesca rose to fame when she entered the villa towards the end of the show, choosing to couple up with dancer Curtis Pritchard until he ditched her for ring girl vixen Maura Higgins.

The blonde beauty was then was forced to coupled up with Liverpudlian fireman Michael Griffiths by default and formed a friendship couple, but the pair were quickly dumped from the villa by their co-stars.

Francesca was praised for her composure during her brief stay in the ITV2 dating show's villa, with many viewers suggesting that she didn't get the chance to shine.
